entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
